STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore thousands of recipes, plan your meals, and become a kitchen maestro with our intuitive cooking app
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore thousands of recipes from various cuisines, skill levels, and dietary preferences.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Follow clear, intuitive instructions with photos for each cooking step.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Discover new recipes tailored to your taste preferences and cooking history.

FEATURE_6_BODY: Share your culinary creations and connect with fellow food enthusiasts.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about our cooking recipe app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I search for recipes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: You can search for recipes by entering ingredients, dish names, or cuisines in the search bar. Use filters to refine your search by dietary preferences, cooking time, or difficulty level.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I save my favorite recipes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes! Simply tap the heart icon on any recipe to add it to your favorites. You can access your saved recipes anytime in the 'My Favorites' section of the app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How do I adjust serving sizes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Each recipe has a serving size adjuster. Just enter the number of servings you need, and the app will automatically recalculate ingredient quantities for you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I add my own recipes to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! Go to the 'My Recipes' section and tap 'Add New Recipe'. You can input ingredients, instructions, and even add photos of your culinary creations.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a meal planning feature?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our app includes a meal planner. You can drag and drop recipes into a weekly calendar, and the app will generate a shopping list based on your meal plan.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Cooking Recipe App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How do I search for recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app offers multiple ways to search for recipes. You can use keywords, ingredients, cuisine types, or dietary restrictions. Simply type in the search bar or use the filter options to find the perfect recipe for your needs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I save my favorite recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes! You can easily save your favorite recipes by tapping the 'heart' icon on any recipe page. Access your saved recipes anytime in the 'Favorites' section of your profile.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Are there options for dietary restrictions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app caters to various dietary needs. You can filter recipes based on vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, and many other dietary requirements. Each recipe is clearly labeled with relevant dietary information.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I adjust serving sizes in recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, you can! Our app allows you to easily adjust the serving size for any recipe. Simply use the serving size slider, and the ingredient quantities will automatically update to match your desired number of servings.

PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Tell us your dietary preferences and skill level, and we'll recommend recipes tailored just for you. Discover new favorites and expand your culinary horizons.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Our easy-to-follow instructions and video tutorials make cooking a breeze. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned chef, you'll find our app helpful and inspiring.
